questions.question: What is the predominant color of the power strip's main body?
What color are the accents or protective casing elements?
What is the overall shape of the power surge protector?
How many AC power outlets are visibly present on the device?
What type of connectors are located on the rear panel?
Besides coaxial, what other type of connector is on the back?
What seems to be the material of the external housing?
Does the device have any visible text markings or labels?
Are there any protective covers or shutters over the outlets?
What is the apparent size relative to a standard hand?
Are the AC outlets arranged in a single row or multiple rows?
What is the texture of the main body of the device?
Are there any visible mounting points, holes, or slots?
Describe the visual appearance of the power cord inlet (if any)
What is the orientation of the coaxial connectors, vertical or horizontal?
